title: Over 95,000 tourist arrivals in March
body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st); The Tourism Development Authority says that 274,211 tourists have arrived in the country till March 27th in 2022.
According to the latest reports released by the Authority, the number of foreign tourists who arrived in the country from March 1st to March 27th was 95,377.
According to the report, 20,965 Indian tourists and 10,553 tourists also arrived from the United Kingdom.
The number of tourists who arrived in the country from Russia during the period was 8,537.
Country cannot be rebuilt as long as one family stays in power: Dr. Wijedasa Rajapaksha
